dict.string: On iOS, iPadOS, and macOS 26, the app features a fresh, revised design â€“ including Liquid-Glass effects and Dark Mode support for in-app icons.
You can now select and edit multiple transactions at once. This allows you to assign the same category or specific tags to all of them, for example.
The integrated receipt scanner now automatically detects dates, categorizes transactions, and lists purchased items using Apple Intelligence on iOS / iPadOS 26.
